channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Embed Youtube Video
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Embed Youtube Video

item.title: CVE-2021-24395|2024-08-03T19:28:23.915Z -- unknown -- embed%20youtube%20video
item.description: The editid GET parameter of the Embed Youtube Video WordPress plugin through 1.0 is not sanitised, escaped or validated before inserting to a SQL statement, leading to SQL injection.
